description.value: You have a set of small secondary arms adapted for climbing and hanging from trees. You can't hold or retrieve objects with these limbs, but you can Climb or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grab an Edge] even if one or both of your primary hands are full. You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] while Climbing.
